article_title: Marilyn Beasley: A few questions from a concerned citizen
article_text:
Joplin, MO (64801)

Today

Scattered thunderstorms this morning, then mainly cloudy during the afternoon with thunderstorms likely. A few storms may be severe. High around 75F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%..

Tonight

Thunderstorms early, then cloudy skies after midnight. A few storms may be severe. Low 64F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

og.description: A lot of questions come to mind as I look at the things that have transpired in our country. I’m sure I’m not the only one who looks at our
